definition-item.definition-title: BRUSHES (handles not integral with brushware B25G)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Apparatus with brushes in general
Subclass A45D covers hairdressing or shaving equipment; manicuring or other cosmetic treatmen
Subclass A47L covers domestic washing or cleaning; suction cleaner in general
Subclass A61C covers oral or dental hygiene
Subclass A61H covers physical therapy apparatus e.g. skin or gum massage
Subclass B05C covers apparatus for applying liquids to surfaces in general
Subclass B05D covers process for applying liquids to surfaces in general
Subclass B08B covers cleaning in general or prevention of fouling in general
Subclass B24B covers machine and process for grinding or polishing
Subclass B25G covers handles for hand implements
Subclass B43K covers writing implements e.g. pen or pencil
Subclass B44D covers artistic painting
Subclass B60S covers cleaning of vehicles
Subclass E01H covers street cleaning
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vehicle cleaning apparatus not integral with vehicles

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:
Illustrative example of subject matter classified in A46B
In this place, the following terms or expressions are used with the meaning indicated:

definition-item.definition-title: Brush bodies and bristles moulded as a unit

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The brush body or brush carrier and the bristles are moulded in one piece

definition-item.definition-title: by mouldable materials, e.g. metals, cellulose derivatives, plastics (A46B1/00 takes precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Bristles and carrier or body moulded in one piece

definition-item.definition-title: by welding together bristles made of metal wires or plastic materials

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Machines for fusing or gluing bristle to body

definition-item.definition-title: specially adapted for paint-brushes

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: specially adapted for street-cleaning or rail-cleaning brooms

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: rubber bristles being fixed in or on brush bodies

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Bristles and body moulded in on piece

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Brush material not made of bristles

definition-item.definition-title: Brush bodies; Handles integral with brushware

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Brushes with elastically deformable heads that change shape during use}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {bending or stretching or collapsing (A46B7/023 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {being flexible or resilient during use}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Brush head being articulated with the handle during use.

definition-item.definition-title: {being adjustable and stable during use}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Brush head fixed in one position relative to the handle during use.

definition-item.definition-title: {Removable or interchangeable brush heads}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: specially shaped for holding by the hand

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Bristle carriers arranged in the brush body

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Brushes for which the bristles are not directly joined/attached to the brush body but through an intermediate bristle carrier.

definition-item.definition-title: in an expanding or articulating manner

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {where the bristle carrier retracts or collapses, i.e. for storage}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: interchangeably {removable bristle carriers}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Sliding connections for bristle carriers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangements of the bristles in the brush body

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fixation of the bristle in the body or carrier
Powered brushes with cylindrical, annular or disk shape

definition-item.definition-title: {where the brushing material is not made of bristles, e.g. sponge, rubber or paper}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Fixation of rubber bristles on body
Bristles surrounded with an other material

definition-item.definition-title: {arranged like in cosmetics brushes, e.g. mascara, nail polish, eye shadow}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Brushes characterized by their function, i.e. cosmetic brushes

definition-item.definition-title: {Arranged like in or} for toothbrushes

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Brushes characterized by their function, i.e. toothbrushes

definition-item.definition-title: Arrangement of mixed bristles or tufts of bristles, e.g. wire, fibre, rubber

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Brushes characterized by their function, i.e. cosmetic brushes

definition-item.definition-title: Brushes with reservoir or other means for applying substances, e.g. paints, pastes, water (driven brush bodies A46B13/00; {massage apparatus with liquid delivery A61H7/002, A61H2201/105}; applying liquids or other fluent materials to surfaces by liquid carrying members in general, e.g. by pads B05C1/00, B05D1/28)

section-body.paragraph-text: Subclass B05C covers apparatus for applying liquids to a surface in general.
Subclass A61M covers device for introducing medical product onto the human body.
Subclass B05B covers spraying apparatus in general
This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cleaning devices with liquid supply arrangements
Applying liquids to surfaces by liquid carrying members in general, e.g. by pads

definition-item.definition-title: {with pre-pressurised reservoirs, e.g. aerosols}

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

table-column.paragraph-text: Aerosol containers having specially adapted fitting for applying the contents, e.g. brushes or pads

definition-item.definition-title: {Flexible or deformable reservoirs, e.g. resilient bulbs, compressible tubes}

definition-item.definition-title: connected to supply pipe {or to other external supply means (A46B11/0003 and A46B11/0006 take precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Brush with a single dose substance
Specially adapted to feed bristles upper surface

table-column.paragraph-text: Implement for cleaning floors or furniture connected to the water supply
Domestic water supply line with means to add soap, disinfectant

definition-item.definition-title: Brushes with driven brush bodies {or carriers} (power-driven toothbrushes A61C17/16)

definition-item.definition-title: {Disc-shaped brush bodies}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
The bristle carrier or body forms a disk and the bristles are positioned on a face of said disk.

definition-item.definition-title: power-driven {carriers}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Manually actuated mechanism for generating the movement of the brush

definition-item.definition-title: with reservoir or other means for supplying substances

definition-item.definition-title: with brush driven by the supplied medium

definition-item.definition-title: {with an electrical means}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {with protrusion for polishing teeth}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {Brushes fitted with ventilation suction, e.g. for removing dust (vacuum cleaner A47L7/00)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vacuum cleaners adapted for additional purposes
Details or accessories of vacuum cleaners

definition-item.definition-title: {Brushes fitted with a interdental devices, e.g. toothpick (A46B2200/108 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: {Toothbrushes with flossing arrangements (A61C15/04 takes precedence)}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: {Container, e.g. bag or box with a collection of various devices}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
For exemple a kit with a brush and other products in a bag.

definition-item.definition-title: {Magazins or sets of brushes components, e.g. plurality of brushes linked as a package}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
For exemple a blister or package containing two or more brushes.

definition-item.definition-title: {Self supporting, e.g. brushes that stand upright or in other particular ways}

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: For human or animal care

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Brush specifically designed for massaging the skin or scalp (A46B2200/1026 takes precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Brushes where the principal function is massage.
Subclass A67H covers physical therapy apparatus e.g. skin or gum massage
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Brush for applying or spreading shaving foam or soap

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Brush used for applying cosmetics

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Cosmetic applicators where the brush aspect is important
Subclass A45D covers cosmetic applicators in general
Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Toothbrush for cleaning the teeth or dentures (A61C17/16 takes precedence; bristles arrangements for toothbrushes A46B9/04)

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Denture toothbrush, i.e. used for dentures specifically

section-body.paragraph-text: This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Cleaning device for prostheses removed from oral cavity

definition-item.definition-title: Inter-dental toothbrush, i.e. for cleaning interdental spaces specifically

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Brushes where inter-dental cleaning is principal function
This place does not cover:

definition-item.definition-title: Toothbrush for cleaning animal teeth specifically

section-body.paragraph-text: Attention is drawn to the following places, which may be of interest for search:

definition-item.definition-title: Brushes for applying products to surfaces in general (A46B2200/10 takes precedence)

section-body.paragraph-text: Subclass B05C covers apparatus for applying liquids to surfaces in general
Subclass B43K covers writing implements e.g. pen or pencil

definition-item.definition-title: Brushes for cleaning or polishing

section-body.paragraph-text: Subclass A47L covers domestic washing or cleaning; suction cleaner in general.
Subclass B08B covers cleaning in general or prevention of fouling in general.
Subclass E01H covers street cleaning.
This place does not cover:

table-column.paragraph-text: Vehicle cleaning apparatus not integral with vehicles

definition-item.definition-title: Other application

section-body.paragraph-text: This place covers:
Brush where the brushing function is not the principal purpose
